      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sdt.sulinet.hu:8de96642-dc46-4da3-80f2-20c3950640f5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>8de96642-dc46-4da3-80f2-20c3950640f5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Mit használjunk, honnan?</string>
            <string language="en-US">What and Where From Shall We Use?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was und wo von sollen wir verwenden?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Qu'et où du du devoir nous utiliser ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que e onde do devemos nós usar?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa e dove dal usare?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι και όπου από θα χρησιμοποιήσουμε;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué y donde de  utilizar?</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Mit vegyünk figyelembe számítógép vásárlásakor, és honnan szerezzük be az alkatrészeket?</string>
            <string language="en-US">What Should Be Taken Into Consideration When Buying a Computer and Where From Shall We Get Parts?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">informatika</string>
            <string language="en-US">informatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">vásárlás</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was sollten in Erwägung gezogen werden, wenn man einen 
Computer kauft und wo von sollen wir Teile erhalten?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que devrait être pris en compte en achetant un ordinateur
et où du du devoir nous obtenir des pièces ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que devem ser feitos exame na consideração ao comprar um
computador e onde do devem nós começar as peças?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa dovrebbe essere preso in considerazione quando 
compra un calcolatore e dove dal noi ottenere le parti?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι να ληφθούμε υπόψη κατά την αγορά ενός υπολογιστή 
και όπου από θα έπρεπε θα πάρουμε τα μέρη;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué se deben tomar en la consideración al comprar un 
ordenador y donde de  nosotros conseguir piezas?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">informatique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">informatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">informatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πληροφορική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">informática</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
